body:
What ever happened to boats because I remember being able to do this. I can't do this anymore. Is this intentional and if so, could I have a valid reason?

Thanks, Whittleby
body_tagged:
What ever happened to boats because I remember being able to do this. I can't do this anymore. Is this intentional and if so, could I have a valid reason?

Thanks, Whittleby
title: Boats?

replies.body: They were removed during the Avicore update? Or somewhere around that time. The only reason they don't work now is because the bs NCP plugins. Minecarts still work in a similar way if you're looking for a replacement.
replies.body_tagged: They were removed during the Avicore update? Or somewhere around that time. The only reason they don't work now is because the bs NCP plugins. Minecarts still work in a similar way if you're looking for a replacement.

replies.body:
Thanks ^~^

Btw sorry for not asking whether to use your video :>)
